categoryDesc: Premium quality spices from Indian farms.

products.name: Turmeric
products.description: Pure and finely ground turmeric powder, perfect for cooking and health benefits.

items.name: Bulb Turmeric
items.description: Aromaveda Bulb Turmeric is sourced from certified farms and processed with international quality standards. Known for its deep natural color, strong aroma, and elevated curcumin levels, it is widely preferred for food manufacturing, spice blending, and nutraceutical applications. Each batch is thoroughly cleaned, graded, and packed to ensure consistency, purity, and full export compliance for global markets.

items.name: Finger Turmeric
items.description: Aromaveda Finger Turmeric is sourced from certified farms and processed with international quality standards. Known for its deep natural color, strong aroma, and elevated curcumin levels, it is widely preferred for food manufacturing, spice blending, and nutraceutical applications. Each batch is thoroughly cleaned, graded, and packed to ensure consistency, purity, and full export compliance for global markets.

items.name: Japan Grade Turmeric
items.description: Premium quality turmeric powder that meets Japan's stringent standards. Known for its vibrant color and high curcumin content, it is ideal for culinary and health applications.

items.name: European Grade Turmeric
items.description: Aromaveda European Grade Turmeric is sourced from certified farms and processed with international quality standards. Known for its deep natural color, strong aroma, and elevated curcumin levels, it is widely preferred for food manufacturing, spice blending, and nutraceutical applications. Each batch is thoroughly cleaned, graded, and packed to ensure consistency, purity, and full export compliance for global markets.

items.name: Lakadong Turmeric
items.shortDesc: Premium Lakadong turmeric powder from Meghalaya.
items.description: Lakadong turmeric is renowned for its high curcumin content and vibrant color. Sourced from the hills of Meghalaya, this turmeric powder is perfect for culinary and medicinal uses. It is carefully processed to retain its natural properties and ensure top quality.

products.name: Red Chilli
products.description: Spicy and flavorful red chilli powder, ideal for adding heat to your dishes.

items.name: Kashmiri
items.description: Mild heat with vibrant red color, perfect for enhancing dishes without overpowering them.

specifications.appearance: Deep red to bright crimson, long and fleshy

items.name: Byadgi
items.description: Moderate heat with deep red color, ideal for a variety of culinary uses.

items.name: Guntur Sannam S4
items.description: Hot and pungent, widely used in Indian cuisine for its strong flavor.

specifications.flavor: High heat with a sharp, pungent taste

items.name: S17 Teja
items.description: Very hot and pungent, ideal for those who prefer intense heat in their dishes.

specifications.flavor: Very high heat with a sharp, biting taste
